TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextChange extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关在 事件中发生的更改的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the changes that occur in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象指定在或中发生更改的位置。 A object specifies where a change occurred in a or . 属性指定更改的位置 , 属性指定添加的符号数量, 属性指定移除的符号数。 The property specifies the position of the change, the property specifies how many symbols were added, and the property specifies how many symbols were removed. 当中发生更改时, 符号是单个字符。When the change occurs in a , a symbol is a single character. 当中发生更改时, 符号是以下项之一:When a change occurs in a , a symbol is one of the following: - 元素的开始或结束标记。An opening or closing tag for a element. - 包含 在或中的元素。 A element contained within an or . 请注意, 此类始终只计为一个符号; 包含的任何其他内容或元素不计为符号。Note that such a is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the are not counted as symbols. - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文本元素内的每个16位字符。Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text element. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置已添加到控件的符号数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been added to the control.

value.span: 已添加到控件的符号数。

span.span: The number of symbols that have been added to the control.

The position at which the change occurred.
